attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing.
Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

Judy Moriarty, Zillow, Inc., Corp. Broker

data.description:
*****All Investors! 
All Future Homeowners! ***** 

Don't Wait! You Won't Want To Miss Out On This One! Great Neighborhood And High Curb Appeal, Describes This 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Single Family Dwelling. Short Walk To The Watervliet Library. Located In-Between The Watervliet Arsenal And Watervliet Court House. The Living Room Is Spacious With A Formal Dining Room. Explore With An Added Bonus Room On The 2nd Floor, That Can Be Converted To Whatever Caters To Your Needs. Easy Interstate And Highway Access. As Is. Condition Fair. Property Needs Rehab. Reassignment Of Contract To Buyer.
